direction.raw_text: Laws are made to be broken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not these laws. Spooner. Starts nudging the pile with his shoe.   Calvin, growing impatient...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not hearing me, Detective. There's nothing here... WHEN SUDDENLY The PILE ERUPTS in front of Spooner...Parts flying...AS A ROBOT LEAPS UP FROM BENEATH IT!... Spooner...knocked back...his GUN...skittering across the floor...right to... CALVIN'S FEET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Calvin! Calvin. Stunned.    Speechless. The Robot. Fixing his ILLUMINATED EYES.   Right on her. She steps forward...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goddammit! Stay back! Spooner. Scrambling towards his gun.     Calvin.    Reaching out towards the Robot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calm down, Detective.     There is no danger here... Spooner.   Grabbing up his gun and wheeling round just as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Robot) De-Activate. And the Robot.   Suddenly FREEZES. Spooner. Heart POUNDING. Gets to his feet.         Training the gun on the Robot. Calvin turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you know it was under there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I was metal and didn't want anyone to find me, I'd hide under a pile of junk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This Robot wasn't hiding. What you're looking at is the result of clever programming. The illusion of self-interest and free will. Nothing more. Spooner. Steeping closer to the Robot. Cautiously. Holstering his gun. As Calvin turns for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to go get Dr. Lanning... ...THE ROBOT'S HAND SUDDENLY SHOOTS OUT...grabbing Spooner's gun...from his holster...LIGHTENING FAST...pointing it... right back at him... CLOSE ON Calvin.   Cannot believe this is happening...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said De-Activate!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move away from the door, Doctor. Calvin's voice.   Cracking from desperation.    Confusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commence emergency shut-down!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now! Spooner. Staring into the Robot's eyes. A thin bead of SWEAT. Trickling down his temple. Calvin. Moving away from the door...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I gave you an order... The Robot. Starts backing towards the door. The gun. Shaking in its hand. As if he's desperate. Conflicted. He touches the WALL PANEL. The doors slide open. The Robot steps out into the metal corridor. Turning to RUN as the doors begin to shut... Spooner. Reaching down to whip out a BACK-UP GUN.     From an ankle holster. Slapping in a LARGE CARTRIDGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is impossible.   A robot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...can't do that.    Yeah, yeah, I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My God -- did you see how it moved? I've never seen an NS-2 move that way... Starts running for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Please, you can't destroy it. We have to study it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That thing took my gun. You'll be lucky if you get a handful of bolts back! SLAMS the wall panel and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 25   INT. METAL CORRIDOR - CONTINUOUS                                  25 ...sprints out into the hallway.     The Robot Suspect.   About to turn to corner... VICTOR.   Suddenly appearing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The suspect is nearing the end of the hallway, Detective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gee, thanks. Spooner raises his gun and FIRES...Pegging the robot in the LEG...It starts jerking wildly...He takes aim again when... CALVIN.   Races out into the hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back to the lab! She heads for the Robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're malfunctioning.   Let me help you! The Robot turns. To look at her. GUN pointing to the floor. Spooner. FOCUSING in on his HAND. AS ONE FINGER TWITCHES... And he DIVES for Calvin. Forcing her to the floor as the Robot FIRES. Again and again. Bullets. RICOCHETTING around them. SPARKING against the walls... The ELEVATOR opens.   The Robot, leaping inside. Spooner. On top of Calvin. Looks down at her.        Her HANDS. Clutching his coat. Trembling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was a pretty convincing illusion of getting shot at.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Looks back at the other ROBOT. Standing in the back of elevator. A primitive model. No reaction. Face, blank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I took the liberty of alerting Security .003 Seconds after the first shot was fired...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's that elevator going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sub Level 5. Spooner SLAMS against a nearby DOOR.   Hurtling down the STAIRS... 28   INT. LOBBY - CONTINUOUS                                         28 A PHALANX of SECURITY PERSONNEL.   Crossing the lobby. PIERCING ALARM BELLS, RINGING... 29   INT. ANOTHER METAL HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                         29 More SECURITY PERSONNEL.   Pouring into a HALLWAY... 30   INT. STAIRWAY - CONTINUOUS                                      30 Spooner and Calvin. Racing down the stairs.     Victor's face meeting them at every landing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have directed a security team to meet the elevator containing the errant robot... Spooner. Whipping past him. Calvin.      Barely keeping up. Not used to this much activity. Spooner.   BURSTS through a door and out into... 31   INT. SUBTERRANEAN LEVEL 5 - CONTINUOUS                          31 ...Subterranean Level 5. A labyrinth of metal and concrete. IN THE DISTANCE. A troupe of SECURITY PERSONNEL swarms around a closed ELEVATOR DOOR...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The suspect is about to be apprehended, Detective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll believe it when I see it. Spooner. Cocking his gun.   A soft DING!    Announcing the elevator car's arrival. SECURITY, all crouching down in unison.    Weapons brought round to position. Spooner. Weaving through them.   Gun pointed at the metal doors as... WHOOSH. They slide open. Revealing a ROBOT. Standing under the LIGHT. Holding a GUN. It steps out as Security takes aim and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Spooner pushes past them to the Robot.    Looks down at its leg. UNSCATHED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is not the same robot! Looking wildly around. Goddammit. Bounds towards an EXIT as Calvin steps forward to question the robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Robot) What happened to the robot that ordered you to hold this firearm?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This unit is not programmed to obey an order given by a robot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But who gave you this gun? SPOONER. Running towards the exit.    Hears the answer. Echoing behind him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A metal man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 32   EXT. U.S. ROBOTICS - DAY                                       32 BAM! He BURSTS out into the PLAZA in front of U.S. Robotics. Squinting into the light. Then PLUNGING into the crowd... HUMAN...ROBOT...HUMAN...ROBOT...they all look the same from behind. Spooner running. Through the sea of MAN and MACHINE. When someone. Starts to SCREAM. At the sight of his GUN. The crowd begins SCATTERING. Chaos. Spooner stops. Near a fountain. Turning 360. Looking everywhere... The Robot.   Gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I want a homicide unit on every street, sidewalk, alley... 33   INT. POLICE H.Q. - HOMICIDE UNIT - DAY                         33 Spooner, standing in front of an assemblage of COPS. Behind him, an image of the Robot Suspect plays on the screen...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...junkyard, scrapyard, and salvage yard, anywhere it could hide. Behind him, flashing images of the city STREETS and DUMPS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's got a bullet hole above the right knee, so be on the look-out for any malfunctioning NS-2... Lieutenant Bergin enters the back of the room.     Next to him, ASSISTANT D.A. TOLLER. Not looking happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check out all retail outlets and repair shops, especially the underground ones... The screen behind him compartmentalises, showing various dubious SHOP FRONTS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care who you have to get past to get this done. Just get it done. The Cops, begin dispersing. As Bergin catches Spooner's eye. Spooner, not pleased to see Toller. Heads over...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looking like shit, Spooner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well I'm not the one always giving Press Conferences... Bergin puts a hand on Spooner's arm.   Knows he's not going to like this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Del, we're going to have to reclassify the search. D.A.'s office is seeing this NS-2 as "missing evidence" -- not a homicide suspect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Homicide is the murder of a human being by another human being. Therefore, a robot cannot be charged with "homicide."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't just any robot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's malfunctioning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It killed someone. That registering with you? Spooner.   Shakes off Bergin's arm.   Eyeballs Toller.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many shares of U.S.R. you holding in your portfolio, Toller?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a public safety issue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's convenient.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have any idea what would happen to this city if we went running around screaming "killer robot?" It would collapse in on itself. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wide-spread panic. Until that NS- 2's found we're cooperating with U.S. Robotics and keeping this investigation under wraps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe this isn't the case for you, Del. Incensed, Spooner replies a little louder than he intended.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fine! Rakes his hand through his hair. Turns to see the other COPS, looking over at him. Toller smirks. Looks to Bergin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want updated reports every half hour. Heads off.    Spooner.   Watching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it, you know. From now on we're going to miss the good old days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good old days?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When people were killed by other people. 34   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CITY STREET - DUSK                      34 Spooner. Rolling along in his car.       Eyes, bloodshot. Peering out the window: An NS-2 model ROBOT laden with shopping bags, following its owner down the sidewalk... Another ROBOT, opening the door at a hotel for GUESTS... A couple HAULING ROBOTS, loading heavy boxes onto the back of a truck... Spooner.     Rubs his eyes.   Turns a corner and spots: A ROBOT REPAIR SHOP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The latest models in the window. Shiny. Streamlined. Spooner watches as a WOMAN leads her faulty NS-2 to the service entrance. He stops the car. 35   INT. TAXI (MOVING) - ESTATE STREETS - NIGHT                 35 Calvin riding in the back of a DRIVERLESS taxi cab. Staring out the window, lost in thought. The cab pulls up to a curb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have arrived at your destination. Calvin.   Takes a beat.   Then swipes her card. 36   EXT. CALVIN'S CONDO ESTATE - NIGHT                          36 Elegant condos set on prime real estate. Calvin heads down a tree-lined walk towards her condo entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of my bullets hit your robot... Startled. She drops her key card. As Spooner steps out from behind a tree. The tail of his coat, whipping in the wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective!...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I think it's smart enough to repair itself -- don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. I think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any repair shop...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. It's always the owner who brings the robot in for repair. Where would a robot without an owner go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure what you're getting at.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stepping closer) Does U.S. Robotics have a factory in the city limits? Calvin.   Tucking her hair behind her ears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The locations of our factories are classified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care. Calvin.   Looks up at him.   A Mexican stand-off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have several conditions if I show you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I expected that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First. I want it brought in unharmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (doesn't like it, but) Agreed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Second.   I want to talk to it, alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This model violated the Three Laws. It also moved and reacted differently than any robot I've ever seen. There must be some sort of logical explanation. I want to find out what that is. No police. No prosecutors. No you. Just me and the robot. Spooner, looks down at this small woman.      Narrows his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When they told me you were a psychologist, that wasn't the whole truth, was it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never said I treated human beings. 37   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR (MOVING) - CITY UNDERPASS - NIGHT   37 Spooner's car races down a RAMP and the roadway becomes a 16- lane underground tunnel system. A river of HEADLIGHTS stretches forever in either direction. A CONTROL BEAM locks onto the car, guiding it to a merge with TRAFFIC. Spooner hits the OVERRIDE BUTTON -- and switches to manual. Calvin watches him take the wheel. Shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That should be outlawed once and for all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'll be the day I stop driving. Spooner jams the GAS PEDAL and the tunnel becomes a BLUR. Calvin holds onto the dashboard. Looking a little pale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can recommend a behavior modification program, you know -- if you want to overcome your robo- phobia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not afraid of robots.   I just don't like them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? Because they make every aspect of our lives more convenient?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly. They do our dirty work. Ever do hard labor, Doctor? Gets pretty old, pretty fast. Nobody can do someone else's dirty work without coming to hate them. I don't want to be around when your robots decide they've taken their last order.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That day will never come, Detective. Robots aren't like human beings -- they don't question their existence. Spooner cranks the gear shift.    Throwing her a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spoken like a true robo-phile. 38   EXT. U.S. ROBOTICS PLANT - NIGHT                               38 The car comes to a stop in a vast INDUSTRIAL DISTRICT. Spooner and Calvin get out, looking up at the imposing facade of a U.S. Robotics Assembly Plant. A long STEEL GATE -- too high to see over -- protects the unmarked complex. 39   EXT. MAIN GATE - NIGHT                                         39 Calvin looks anxious as the DOOR MECHANISM scans her U.S.R. ID. She shoots a look at Spooner. They wait. Then, slowly, the gate begins to open. 40   INT. HALLWAY - NIGHT                                           40 A NIGHT FOREMAN leads them down a hallway.    Shaking his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Head-Office already ordered a system-wide inventory check. Don't know about a missing NS-2... Looks back at Spooner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd you say you did?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Research and Development. As Spooner pushes past him into... 41   INT. CONTROL BOOTH - CONTINUOUS                                41 ...the Control Booth. Overlooking the pristine Factory Floor. The Foreman starts working the controls of a central computer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All Nestors accounted for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The SCREEN scrolls with INVENTORY FIGURES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you can see, all properly catalogued. Your robot just isn't here. Calvin turns to say something to Spooner. But he isn't there. She looks around. Then sees the Foreman reacting. Looks out the window at... SPOONER.   Walking out onto the factory floor. 42   INT. FACTORY FLOOR - NIGHT                                       42 Spooner trots alongside an ASSEMBLY LINE BELT. Lined with NS- 2 LEGS. New. Gleaming. Heading towards the assembly room. Calvin and the Foreman.   Catching up.   Over the noise:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like I said, sir -- we have one hundred fully assembled NS-2s housed here. That's our capacity. Last week we had one hundred. Yesterday we had one hundred -- Spooner, slowing.   Finally spotting what he was looking for. Points at: A GAP.   On the assembly belt.    ONE LEG MISSING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well today you have one-hundred and one. 43   INT. FACTORY FLOOR - NIGHT                                       43 A STORAGE COMPARTMENT opens and 101 NS-2s march out in tight formation. Every step and swing of the arm in unison. The sound of METAL FOOTSTEPS reverberating through the plant as 101 Robots organise themselves into long straight lines. Spooner and Calvin look up and down the formation. They all look alike. Spooner. Throws up his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're the robot shrink. The Robots stand motionless.     A strange tableau.   Calvin. Takes a step forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a robot in this formation that does not belong. Identify it. 101 robots answer in unison.    Their mechanical VOICES resounding:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is not a satisfactory answer!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's helpful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could always interview each one individually and cross-reference their responses to detect any anomalies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long would that take?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About three weeks. They share a look. Clearly not an option.      Then.   Calvin. Gets an idea. Turns to Spooner...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or... ...and GRABS his GUN from his holster.   He jumps back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have one hundred robots here that cannot allow a human being to come to harm... Their eyes lock.   Spooner, getting what she's doing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And one that can. She raises the gun to Spooner's head.    Hand, unsteady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I holding this right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More or less. Calvin.    Swallows.   Looks over at the robots.   Then COCKS the gun... AND THE ROBOTS COME THUNDERING TOWARDS THEM. Like a row of linebackers. Arms straight out. Their footsteps DEAFENING. Coming CLOSER and CLOSER... When CALVIN. Lowers the gun. The Robots. All stop in unison. Immediately returning to their resting positions. Spooner and Calvin stare out. EVERY ONE OF THE ROBOTS MOVED. Standing right in front of them, like metal statues. Spooner.    Has had enough.   Takes the gun back from Calvin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough game-playing. ...And BAM! Blows the head off of the nearest Robot.       Its body crumples to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guess that wasn't it. Calvin. Cannot believe what he just did.     Rushes over to the destroyed Robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?! Spooner walks down the row, holding his gun in plain view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling out) This is a self-preservation field test! DO NOT attempt to save yourselves. Any of you. That's an order! FROM THE CONTROL BOOTH the Night Foreman screams over the P.A.:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you crazy? Those are eight hundred thousand dollar machines! Spooner randomly stops at another Robot.    Raises his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hear that? You're worth more than I'll make in my entire life... His finger tightening on the trigger when Calvin suddenly grabs his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't just destroy them! Spooner. Looking down at her. WHEN SUDDENLY something catches his eye. A MOVEMENT. Down the line. Almost. Imperceptible. He jerks his head.   Locking eyes with a ROBOT.   A couple feet away. It's him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotcha. The Robot Suspect LEAPS forward. Grabbing onto the RAILING of an OVERHEAD CATWALK. His movements almost balletic as he swings himself up... Spooner drops to his knee...taking aim...but misses as the Robot launches himself THROUGH THE CONTROL BOOTH WINDOW with a terrific CRASH... 44   INT. CONTROL BOOTH - NIGHT                                    44 Spooner and Calvin rush in to find the Night Foreman hiding under his desk. Glass everywhere. An ALARM SCREAMING. The door on the other side, barely hanging off a hinge. Spooner hurries forward. Then stops. Turning to Calvin. Reaches down for his back-up gun and presses it into her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know what's going to happen in there. As if admitting defeat. Calvin's fingers, wrapping around the gun. As Spooner leads them to the door and down into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 45   INT. ASSEMBLY ROOM - CONTINUOUS                               45 ...the ASSEMBLY ROOM. Every surface looking like part of a great glass and metal machine. Endless high-tech planes holding ROBOTS in various states of assembly. The deafening ROAR of the assembly line as it slides, rotates, and gnashes METAL BODIES... Spooner.   Motioning Calvin to stay behind him.   As they descend.   Into the cavernous room. And enter. A narrow corridor of bodies. Sliding past them. Brushing shoulders, thighs, hands. Spooner. Wiping sweat from his brow. Trying. To pivot himself... When the room. Suddenly REARRANGES itself. Another LINE of ROBOTS. Descending between Spooner and Calvin. Cutting them off from one another... Spooner. Catching glimpses of Calvin. On the other side of the metal bodies. Trying. To cut through. His heart. Starting to POUND. As Calvin. Disappears... He swivels round. But another line of ROBOTS. Drops down. Cutting him off. He stumbles back. As another line. Appears before him... Breathing. Getting heavier. He looks down at his hand. It's trembling. NOISE CRASHING, all around him. Everywhere he turns. More ROBOTS...BLANK EYES...GAPING MOUTHS... He darts through the line. Finds a wall. Leaning against it, pulls a small BOTTLE from his pocket. Rips off the lid. Shakes out a couple PILLS. Swallows them. Staring down. At his trembling hand. Squeezing his eyes. Open and shut... WHEN SUDDENLY. A passing ROBOT. Grabs him by the collar. SMASHING him against the wall. It's the Suspect. Spooner. Sinks to the ground. As the Suspect Robot. Slips off the line. STANDING. Over him. Raising his arms. Could end it. Right now. But looks. Into Spooner's eyes... Then turns.   Disappearing. Spooner. Stunned for a second. Then. Rallies. Scrambles to his feet and plunges back into the maze of bodies. Hears a POUNDING. In the distance. Catches a glimpse. Of the Robot. Trying to SMASH through a large SECURITY DOOR. With his metal fists... Spooner's view. Blocked once again.   By a shifting row. When a HAND. Lands on his shoulder.   He wheels round. 37. To find CALVIN. Takes her by the arm.     And forces them through a line... EMERGING into the open. The ROBOT. Still pounding. Desperate. Like a trapped animal...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what do we do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've already done it. And suddenly, the massive SECURITY DOOR RISES... 46   EXT. U.S. ROBOTICS PLANT - CONTINUOUS                             46 The Robot Suspect takes its chance.     Runs full out.   STOPS. Bergin is standing in front of a solid wall of POLICE CARS. UNIFORMED OFFICERS are aiming SPECIALISED RIFLES at the Robot. FLASHING LIGHTS reflecting off its metal surface. The Robot turns to Spooner.     Extends its hands.   Palms out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ? Spooner is surprised. A POLICE OFFICER fires, RUBBERISED NETTING shooting out at Sonny. A SECOND OFFICER fires and a second net covers him. Then a THIRD... ...and the Robot falls to the ground, struggling. Calvin glares at Spooner.    Furious.   Hurt.   Betrayed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We had a deal. But Spooner doesn't look at her.    His eyes are locked on that Robot. 47   INT. POLICE H.Q. - HOMICIDE UNIT - EARLY MORNING                  47 Bergin enters.   Finds EVERYONE focused on the VIDEO WALL: ON SCREEN. A NEWS REPORTER is speaking over images of street violence perpetrated against ROBOTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Violence erupted last night in response to unconfirmed reports that Dr. Heinrich Hogenmiller, a top employee at U.S. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robotics, was killed yesterday morning by a robot. While there has been no official response from the company, police sources have confirmed that a robot is being held as "evidence..." Bergin grimaces.   This is not good. 48   INT. CELL OBSERVATION BOOTH - EARLY MORNING                     48 Spooner stares at his reflection in a large MIRROR.     Touches a control and the mirror becomes a WINDOW onto... A HOLDING CELL. The Robot Suspect sits at the table. Shackled to the chair. Staring at the table top. BERGIN steps up beside Spooner.   Looks through the glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't tell if it's not moving because it's trying to psych us out, or because it's just a machine. Or both.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to go in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orders are nobody steps into that room `til Lanning and his attorneys get here. Spooner.   Throws him a look.   Bergin, his loyalties torn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five minutes. 49   INT. HOLDING CELL - EARLY MORNING                               49 Spooner enters. Pulls out a chair and drags it far from the table. He's been jumped too many times by this machine. Four mounted cameras WHIR to life.     The Robot.   Perfectly still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Identify. The Robot tilts its head with a muted WHIR.     As if it doesn't understand him. Spooner. Disdainful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are an NS-2 Nestor-class robot. Your primary function is to perform the tasks assigned to you. Identify.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am an NS-2 Nestor-class robot. My primary function -- SPOONER (interrupting) Cancel. Perform task. Spooner wings a FILE onto the table. It comes to a stop near the Robot. The Robot, lifts one of its hands. Gently resting its metal fingers on top of the file. Then opens it. A stack of PICTURES.     HOGENMILLER'S CORPSE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Describe. The Robot's emotionless face studies the grim images.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have over 10,000 words stored in your memory. One third of those are adjectives. Describe. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't I take a crack? Heinrich Hogenmiller, your creator. With a bullet in his brain. A bullet you put there. The Robot.   Looks up at Spooner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cold-blooded murder is a pretty new trick for a robot, don't you think? Answer. The Robot slowly closes the file and slides it back across the table. Spooner. Crosses his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you're stonewalling me. Maybe you're sitting there right now thinking, "This guy's a complete asshole." That it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Still nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on.   Am I right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. You are right.      You are a complete asshole. And for a moment, Spooner is shocked. You can see it in his eyes. He sits back in his chair. Forcing a tight smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. I guess that's a start. Now maybe you can tell me what you were doing hiding five feet away from Hogenmiller's corpse?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was frightened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frightened. Why do you suppose Dr. Hogenmiller would create a robot that could simulate fear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't seem like a very useful thing for a robot to have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know why.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't want my toaster to be frightened. Or my vacuum cleaner -- SUDDENLY the Robot SLAMS its metal hands down on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Spooner flinches.   Slightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like you can simulate other emotional states. I think that one's called "anger." Have you ever simulated anger before?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Robot doesn't respond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Answer me, robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Sonny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (amused) So we're naming you now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Hogenmiller would make me sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean he'd turn you off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you didn't like being turned off. So one day you decided to stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You found his gun, pointed it at his head. And pulled the trigger. Sonny shakes his head.    Faster and faster.   Getting upset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You put a bullet in the brain of the man who made you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!    I could never hurt anyone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you tried to hurt me.    You took a shot at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My aim is perfect. If I'd wanted to hit you, I would have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Spooner's expression hardens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would the man who wrote the Laws of Robotics build a machine that violates them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Laws say I can protect my own existence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only if that protection doesn't harm a human being. A short pause.   Sonny.   Tilts his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That doesn't seem fair, does it? Spooner. Stares at him. Just as...THE DOOR SWINGS OPEN. Bergin enters. Sticks his head in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you outside. Spooner.   Not wanting to go.   Not wanting to stay.   Gets up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective. He stops. Turns back to the Robot.      It looks up at him.    For a moment -- so human...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did not kill him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were the only one in the room. If you didn't, who did? He turns and heads out the door. 50   INT. OUTSIDE HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS                          50 Bergin closes the door.   To Spooner:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're being blind-sided.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 51   INT. HOMICIDE UNIT HEARING ROOM - MORNING                     51 Spooner and Bergin, head into a small COURTROOM off the main squad room. Lanning is huddled with Aronson and a half-dozen other COMPANY LAWYERS. Spooner's jaw tenses. As he watches Toller emerge from the clutch. Shaking hands. Slapping backs. Strolls over to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got Judge Drexel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This hearing is called to order! AS A LARGE SCREEN. BLIPS on behind them. The two opposing sides, assemble before it. JUDGE DREXEL, still in his pajamas and robe. An NS-2 ROBOT. Leaning in to serve him a cup of tea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Statements, gentlemen. Aronson.    Standing at a glass podium.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Honor, the State is treating the robot as a defendant. But in fact it is a piece of property. Property belonging to U.S. Robotics. Toller.    Arm resting on his podium.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This robot has been implicated in the death of a human being, Your Honor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which places the incident firmly within the realm of an industrial accident. Or is the State going to argue this case s a homicide?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a good question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, sir.   Of course not. Spooner.    Pointing a finger at the U.S. Robotics group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Their machine shot and killed a man! Toller.    Shoots him a look.     Just as Lanning speaks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's actually no concrete evidence that points to that conclusion, Your Honor... Spooner.    Throws up his arms...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we recognise that this robot is an aberration. And in the interest of public safety, U.S. Robotics proposes that it be destroyed immediately. No one expected this.    Least of all Spooner.    He turns to Toller.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't let them destroy evidence in an ongoing investigation!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure you even have an investigation any more. JUST THEN the door opens.    Everyone turns as Calvin enters. Spooner looks surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Honor, I'd like to call our company robo-psychologist to the stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well. Calvin crosses to the podium. A SPEAKER asking: Doyousweartotellthetruththewholetruthandnothingbutthetruth?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Calvin, please tell us what conclusions you've reached after having observed the robot in action.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a design flaw in the robot. Its programming is advanced, but unstable, leaving the Three Laws in a grave imbalance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In your expert opinion, what measures should be taken regarding the device? Calvin.    Staring straight ahead.   Avoiding Spooner's eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The robot must be destroyed. Spooner can't believe what he's just heard. About to speak up when Toller grabs his arm. Squeezing it. Hard. Judge Drexel has heard enough.    Decides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The robot in question will be transferred to a U.S. Robotics facility where it can be properly examined to ensure an imbalance of this sort never occurs again. No one goes near it except qualified U.S.R. personnel. When the examination is complete, the robot is to be destroyed. Starts getting up from his chair.    Already done with this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This hearing is adjourned! A BURST of CONVERSATION as the screen BLIPS off. The U.S.R. camp, looking especially pleased. Spooner. Catching Calvin's eye briefly. As Lanning leads her towards the exit, his hand on her back. 52   EXT. POLICE H.Q. - DAY                                          52 Spooner.    Trotting down the front steps of the Police Station.    Pissed. His cell phone BLEATS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spooner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're making me turn over all the evidence...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome to the great American cover- up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to tell you something I found before they suck it all up into their computer. Walks over to the projection of HOGENMILLER'S BODY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are bruises on Hogenmiller's wrists...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's natural. There was a struggle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not getting me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Both wrists. I 14-ed them -- They were inflicted at the same time the shot was fired...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Spooner's pace.    Slows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's that possible? JUST THEN.    A faint BLIP.   On the line.   Spooner.   Reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baldez?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm here, man...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who else is on the line? (nothing) I said who's there?... Nothing. He looks up. Aronson, Lanning and Calvin. Heading down a plaza EXIT. Aronson. Throwing a look over his shoulder. Spooner.     Hangs up his phone. 54   INT. POLICE H.Q. - CORRIDOR - DAY                                 54 CLOSE ON Sonny being escorted down a corridor by Toller, Bergin and a number of heavily-armed OFFICERS. He's bound with high-tech SHACKLES. 55   INT. UNDERGROUND CAR PARK - DAY                                   55 Sonny and his police entourage emerge from the elevator into an underground car park. Spooner. Waiting for them. Heads over. Toller. Holds out his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Case is closed, Spooner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Apparently... He pushes past him.     Falling into step beside Sonny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't expect to see you again, Detective...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you to help me clear something up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do my best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A scientist builds a robot that acts like a man. More like a man than any robot ever before. It shoots him and U.S. Robotics calls it a failure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What would you call it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A stunning success. (beat) You were there, Robot.    What am I missing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't start simulating ignorance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not simulating ignorance, Detective. I'm experiencing it.       I was asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean you were shut down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I was asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robots don't sleep. Human beings sleep. Understand? Dogs sleep. You're a machine. An imitation. An illusion of life. Can a robot write a symphony? Can a robot take a blank canvas and paint a masterpiece? A pause.   Then the muted WHIR as Sonny turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you do either of those things? Spooner. Momentarily stumped. As a VAN from U.S. ROBOTICS pulls up. The back door dropping open. An ENGINEER motions to the Robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Step forward. Enter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're going to destroy me, aren't they? Spooner.   Watching him step into the van.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Sonny sits down. With an almost human melancholy.   The Engineers, securing him in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Doctor was right. He told me everything was going to change.... The Engineers start to close the doors. But Spooner reaches out to stop them. Sonny. Looks over at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's changing already... (beat) Can't you feel it? As CLANG! The van door CLOSES. Spooner, stepping back. Something. Just not right. Lieutenant Bergin comes up beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should be happy. That's one less robot in the world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're going to destroy the most advanced robot in the world, John. That doesn't strike you as odd?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Killer robots are bad for business. Even your friend Dr. Calvin said so. (slaps him on the back) Come on. You solved the case. Give yourself a break. Spooner looks at him.   There's no way he's giving himself a break.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 56   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - DAY                                 56 Spooner driving. A small TELEVISION above the windshield. LANCE ROBERTSON holding a PRESS CONFERENCE outside U.S. Robotics...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and I just want to assure you that this was an isolated incident. The prototype is now in custody -- and scheduled for destruction. Your robots are perfectly safe. There is no cause for alarm... Spooner's lip curls. Eyes flicking to a GPS display on the dashboard. A TOPOGRAPHICAL MAP pinpointing HOGENMILLER'S HOUSE. The CURSOR. Directing him to turn up... A STEEP DRIVEWAY Narrow. Out of the way. Spooner's brow furrows.     As he hears a faraway RUMBLING SOUND... 57   EXT. HOGENMILLER'S HOUSE - DAY                                57 Dr. Hogenmiller's house. Small. Simple. Built on a huge rock promontory overlooking the city. Three DEMOLITION ROBOTS rolling towards it. Huge, mashing, sporting massive HYDRAULIC POUNDERS. Spooner's CAR. SCREECHES to a stop. He jumps out. Races over to the nearest machine. Looking around -- no people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?! A SCREEN. Blinks to life on the hulking chassis.    A disembodied VOICE...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Demolition ordered...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who authorised this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Demolition ordered... Spooner reaches into his coat.    Pulling out his POLICE BADGE. Scans it over the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Override. This is police business. Vacate the premises immediately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Affirmative. The screen. Blinks off.     Spooner.   Eyeing it.   Turns and heads for the house. 58   INT. MAIN ROOM - HOGENMILLER'S HOUSE - DAY                       58 Spooner pushes the door open. Stepping over the police tape. Inside, the main room is spare, untidy. Cups of cold COFFEE, littering surfaces. A COT, in the corner. On the walls, crooked CERTIFICATES. Heinrich Hogenmiller's name written out in academic script. Advanced Degrees in the study of Robotics, Physics, Chemistry, Neurology, Ethics. An AWARD on the mantelpiece. A silver NS-2. Tarnished. Spooner. Opening up a couple drawers of a side table. Jumbles of papers. Clippings. Old text books. Then a PHOTOGRAPH -- HOGENMILLER AND CALVIN. Standing arm-in-arm. Spooner furrows his brow. WHEN SOMETHING SUDDENLY RUBS against his leg. He startles. Looks down: a CAT. Lonely. Standing next to its automatic feeder. Spooner pockets the picture. Starts heading down... 59   INT. HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                                        59 ...The hallway. Starts noticing. All over the walls: handwriting. EQUATIONS. Scrawled in white pencil. The rantings. Of a genius. Glowing. In the sporadic shadows. Spooner.   Following the equations.    Down into... 60   INT. BACK ROOM - CONTINUOUS                                      60 ...The back room. Covered. In writing. Walls, floors, ceiling. Drawings. Of ROBOTS, of MEN, side by side. In the corner, a COMPUTER. A line of CABINETS - DATA STORAGE. Spooner, curious. Heads over to one of the cabinets. Takes a device out of his pocket and CLAMPS it over the KEYPAD. The device blinks RED. Then GREEN. The drawer, slides out. LINED. With flat metal objects. Shiny. Thin.          With writing on them. Spooner. Reaches for one when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BOOM! Something POUNDS the outside of the room.    Spooner. Grabs onto the cabinet... BOOM! On the other side. Objects. Flying off table-tops. A CRACK spidering along the wall. Holy shit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Halt! BOOM! VIBRATIONS, tearing through the room.     More CRACKS. Spreading... BOOM! The SOUND, horrifying. Spooner stumbles back.      The CABINET. Crashing down on his leg. He CRIES OUT... BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! The house. Getting pummeled.        Chunks of ceiling. Raining down. GLASS...exploding... Relentless BOOMING! Spooner...dragging his legs from under the cabinet. Scrambling for purchase as... THE FLOOR...begins to tilt...the TILES...snapping up...ricocheting...around the room...as another cabinet... CRASHES to the ground...crumpling... Spooner.   Spinning around.   Looking for some kind of exit... BOOM! The corner of the room...coming in on itself...the floor...listing even more...like a ship... Spooner...turning to CLAW his way up to the cracked doorway...WHEN... SOMETHING catches his eye. In the bottom drawer. Of a crumpled CABINET. One of those flat metal plates. He can just read what it says: S.O.N.N.Y.... Spooner...flings his arm back...reaching for the plate... snaps it up...JUST AS... BOOM! A HYDRAULIC POUNDER SMASHES through the wall...inches from his head...OUTSIDE LIGHT...pouring in... Spooner scurries for the doorway...tumbling out... 61   INT. HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                                      61 ...into the HALLWAY. Sideways. Trammeled plaster. BOOM! Another POUNDER...crashing down from above. Spooner. Timing it...rolling...BOOM!...just under the next pounding...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Scampering up...towards some LIGHT...BOOM!...the POUNDER...right on his heels...he clambers...closer... closer...when...he hears...MEOWING...looks back...the CAT...scared out of its wits...BOOM!...the POUNDER CRASHING in...Spooner...just manages...to scoop up the cat...just as BOOM!... 62   EXT. DEMOLISHED HOUSE - CONTINUOUS                            62 ...He pours them out into the open. The POUNDERS. Going at the house like hyenas at a corpse. Roof tiles, beams, plaster, flooring. SNAPPING and CRACKING as Spooner and the cat skitter down the carnage. Heart pounding, breath jagged, face bloodied, Spooner scrambles away from the POUNDERS. Their bodies GLEAMING in the dusk sun. The III Laws Safe logo, splashed along their sides... Spooner.   Drops the cat. 63   INT. HALLWAY - CALVIN'S CONDO - NIGHT                         63 Spooner. POUNDS on the door. It opens. Calvin. Standing there in her bathrobe. Shocked at his appearance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective! What happened to you?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A couple of your beloved robots just tried to kill me... He pushes past her.   Into... 64   INT. CALVIN'S CONDO - CONTINUOUS                              64 ...her condo.   Spartan.    Unadorned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? That's impossible.      You know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I know is a demolition crew started tearing down Hogenmiller's house while I was still inside it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe they didn't realise...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I scanned my badge before I went in. They realised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you must have done it wrong...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think you're hearing what I'm saying -- they tried to kill me. Spooner moves deeper into the apartment.   Everything. Automated. Computerised. Cold...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's something going on, here. Some kind of shift. Calvin laughs.   Can't believe what she's hearing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know how paranoid you sound?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. Now I'm being analysed by a robo-psychologist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just want to find the flaws in the system. You're obsessed with it. You'll twist anything to fit your agenda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like you did in court today? How'd that fit your agenda, Doctor? He pulls out the PHOTO of Calvin and Hogenmiller. Calvin. Blanching at the sight of it. Spooner tosses it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told me you hardly knew him. Want to try the truth this time?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Detective, when you see someone you know well put a bullet through their brain, it makes you wonder if you ever really knew them at all. Calvin.   Looking down at the photo.   Swallows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (difficult for her) He was my mentor. No, more than that. A genius with an insight far beyond anyone in his field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't sound like the washed-up old fool Robertson described.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he was starting to withdraw from everyone. Even me. Maybe...if I'd tried harder to reach him... (shakes her head) The Doctor was reckless when he created a robot potentially not bound by the Three Laws. He could have ruined everything we'd been working for. Spooner.    Locking eyes with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds like a motive for murder to me. Just not for the suspect we have in custody. Calvin. Blinks. Trying, to stick to her resolve. Heads over to the door. Spooner. Looking around the condo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know there's not one thing in this apartment that looks like a human being lives here. No evidence of a life outside your work. Almost seems like you're afraid of people. Calvin.    Opening the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not afraid of people, Detective. I just don't like them. Spooner. Looks at her.     Then heads out the door.   Calvin SLAMS it behind him... The SOUND...of the SLAM...REVERBERATING...and we...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 65   INT. DREAM SEQUENCE - DAY                                      65 ...A DEEP...DEEP...DARKNESS. A FLICKER. Of LIGHT. Off to the side. Just barely. Noticeable. ORANGE... YELLOW...as we realise...It's FIRE... Another SOUND...GLASS...SHATTERING...then a SIREN... faraway... The disembodied VOICE...coming out of nowhere...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in danger... The FIRE...BUILDING...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in danger... ECHOING...as... 66   INT. SPOONER'S BEDROOM - MORNING                               66 SPOONER'S EYES.   Spring open. Lying, in bed. Heart POUNDING. SWEAT. Covering his body. LIGHT. Pouring in through the slats of his blinds. He sits up. Rubbing his face. Trying. To calm his breathing. Takes a look at his watch... 67   EXT. MONORAIL STATION - DAY                                    67 Spooner walking along the monorail plaza. Looking a little worse for wear. PEOPLE. Giving him wide berth. ROBOTS. Bidding him:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning... Spooner, shooting them suspicious looks.    As the MONORAIL pulls up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Lanning steps out. Followed by a TECHNICIAN ROBOT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find anything, Doctor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. The interior's just like any other NS-2. Except for a secondary battery Hogenmiller must have used as extra back-up. (looks at watch) We'll just need a nominal profile. Calvin nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please state your serial number and assembly date. She pulls out a pen.   Waiting for an answer.   Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sonny.   I'm speaking to you... The Homeless Man.   Suddenly grabs his ears and shouts:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, can't you be quiet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 72   INT. HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS                                  72 Calvin.   Still looking down at her pad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about your data board designation? Still. Sonny says nothing. Calvin. Finally looks up at him. Is suddenly struck. Something about the way he's sitting -- so human. She gets up and walks over. Hesitates. Then slides down on the floor next to him. Studying. His profile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe I'm asking the wrong questions. How about this one:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...What program are you running through right now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure. It's nothing I recognise. The Homeless Man.   Pointing to the group of ROBOTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you people hear them? They're talking to each other! Buzz, buzz, zip, zip...they never shut up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Describe his behavior in the last few weeks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Hogenmiller. Did he seem overly sad or withdrawn to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Not at all. But he was agitated... The Robot. Leans down and picks up the soda can.      Holds it back out to the Homeless Man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...He would claim things were missing from the lab. The Homeless Man. Incensed.     SUDDENLY ROARS.   Making a rush for the Robots when... SPOONER'S HAND.    Grabs his shoulder.   Stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is your stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't pay much attention. He would spend hours looking for his eyeglasses and they would be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...right on top of his head. Sonny nods. She knows him well, too. Calvin swallows. Looking right into Sonny's eyes. Feeling like there's something...something more behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WHEN SUDDENLY...VICTOR APPEARS above them. His face, turning into a SCREEN -- the image of LANCE ROBERTSON. Looking down at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we're done here, Susan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, sir, I was just...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said I think we're done. Calvin.   Not misreading.   The threatening undertone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you protecting them, man? (short pause) They were talking about you! A CHILL. Ripping up Spooner's spine. As he watches the Homeless Man. Wander down the platform. Tries. To shake off the feeling. As he turns. To wait for the next train. Suddenly realising. That he's ALONE on the platform. Watches. A huge DIGITAL CLOCK. Ticking off seconds. Sees. CAMERAS in every corner. Then that feeling. At the back of his neck. He turns and spots. A couple MAINTENANCE ROBOTS. Carrying luggage. Onto the platform. Then more COMMUTERS show up. Waiting. For the next train. More MAINTENANCE ROBOTS. Following them. Spooner. Steps up to the platform's edge.       Craning to see. The approaching TRAIN... WHEN SUDDENLY. He feels a sharp SHOVE. At the back of his knee. His shoe, slipping. Arms. Flailing as he...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PITCHES OVER THE EDGE ONTO THE TRACK. People CRYING OUT as the TRAIN gets closer. Spooner. Whips his head around. Seeing... A MAINTENANCE ROBOT. Looking down at him from the platform. Suitcase in hand. The MAGNETIC-LEVITATING TRAIN. Right on him. Spooner. Flips onto his back. Flattening himself. As much as he can. Clenching his fists. Bracing himself as... THE TRAIN SCREAMS OVER HIM. The sound, DEAFENING. The force of the wind. Whipping his tie. His coat. There's nothing, for him to hold on to. As his legs start to rise off the track. Caught up. In the VORTEX. Spooner starts sliding. Along the track... Gritting his teeth...there's nothing he can do. Getting sucked towards...the air DOWNTAKE...at the center of the track. The city...yawning hundreds of feet...below... 78   EXT. PLATFORM - CONTINUOUS                                      78 THE EXPRESS TRAIN.   Speeding along.   Then with a WHOOSH it's gone. THE TRACK. Empty. No Spooner. Anywhere. Human COMMUTERS. Stunned. Horrified. Start calling. For help. The MAINTENANCE ROBOT.    Turns, disappearing into the crowd. 79   EXT. UNDERNEATH TRACK - CONTINUOUS                              79 CLOSE ON a HAND. Hanging onto the track's edge. It's SPOONER. Dangling. Straining. To get another hand hold but... HE SLIPS. His coat ballooning. As he plummets.     Down... down...down...towards the city... WHEN SNAP! He's caught. By a cable net. Spooner. Grabbing onto it. Sweat, pouring down his face. He turns and sees... THE MAINTENANCE ROBOT Hurrying down a circular stairwell.    Exiting the station. ANGER AND DETERMINATION. Flash across Spooner's eyes. As he hoists himself up. Climbing up the net. Back to the... 80   EXT. TRACK - CONTINUOUS                                         80 ...Track.   Reaching up and clambering back onto... 62. 81   EXT. PLATFORM - CONTINUOUS                                      81 ...The platform. COMMUTERS. SCREAMING at the sight of him. A couple SECURITY GUARDS. Rushing towards him... Spooner. Getting to his feet. Shoving them out of the way as he starts running. Towards... THOSE SAME CIRCULAR STAIRS.    Looks over the edge and spots... THE MAINTENANCE ROBOT.   Down at STREET LEVEL.   Getting away. Spooner. Looks around. Spots a LIGHT POLE.       Paralleling the stairs. Takes a step back and... LEAPS OUT ONTO THE POLE. Hooking his arm around it. Sliding down like a fireman's pole. Gaining speed when THUMP! His shoes hit pavement... 82   EXT. STREET - DAY                                               82 The Maintenance Robot.   Turning a corner.   Down a quiet street...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! Swivels round. SPOONER. Running up behind it. Whipping out his gun. Aiming it at the Robot's head. The Robot. Takes a step backwards...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said stop! The Robot. SUDDENLY swinging the suitcase around. SMASHING it against Spooner's head. Spooner. Buckles. Falling to the ground. Managing to squeeze off a SHOT... The Robot. Deflecting the bullet. With the case.      Raising it as if to club Spooner with it when... BAM! Spooner fires a second shot. Piercing the Robot's breastplate. HYDRAULIC FLUID. Starting to leak. The Robot. Doesn't hesitate. SLAMS the case into Spooner's face... BLOOD. Spurting from Spooner's nose. As he fires the gun. At the fleeing Robot. Gets to his feet. Unsteady. Taking chase... 83   EXT. PUBLIC PLAZA - CONTINUOUS                                  83 ...back out onto the Public Plaza.    Sees the Robot heading towards a set of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ESCALATED STAIRS. The Robot. Judging the height. LUNGES into the air and lands on a STAIR. Denting it. Reaches the bottom. DISAPPEARING. Into a CROWD of even more PEOPLE... Spooner. Racing down the stairs. Taking them. Four at a time. Hits the ground running. Looking. EVERYWHERE. Suddenly losing track. Of where the Robot went... Then. Catching sight. JUST AHEAD. Of a ROBOT.         Staring back at him. Holding SOMETHING. In its HAND... Spooner.   Plunges into the crowd.    Waving his GUN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone out of the way! SCREAMING. PEOPLE SCATTERING. As BAM! BAM! Spooner fires. Hitting the Robot in its head and back. It drops to the ground. Spooner. Racing over to it. Sees. It's not the same Robot. In its hand, a specialised SCREWDRIVER...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell do you think you're doing?!... Its OWNER. Rushing over. Shoving Spooner aside. But Spooner's. Not listening. Spotting. A DROP OF HYDRAULIC FLUID nearby... Lunges forward.   Following.    The drops.   Running faster.     And faster...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! ...Through the CROWD. POLICE SIRENS. In the background.          As Spooner. Shoves through. Tracking those drops. Like a bloodhound. Turns... 84   INT. ALLEYWAY - CONTINUOUS                                        84 ...into a narrow alleyway.     The drops.    Ending suddenly.    In a PUDDLE. Spooner. Crazed. Wounded. Exhausted. Spins around. Where is it? Where is it? Then he HEARS. A DROPLET falling. Into the puddle. Slowly. Looks up to see... THE MAINTENANCE ROBOT. Hovering above him. Straddling the two alley walls like some weird metallic rock spider. Its III LAWS SAFE Logo GLINTING in the sunlight.....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Spooner aims his gun and FIRES! The Maintenance Robot, lets go, falling right onto him. Knocking the gun from his hand. The Robot swivels around. Bringing down his foot...but... Spooner...rolls to the side just in time as CRASH! The Robot's foot...breaks up the concrete... The Robot...grabs Spooner by the jacket...lifting him up...shoving him...against the wall...about to CRUSH him when... Spooner...kicks out its knees...the Robot...SMASHING into the wall...then bounces back...trying...to pin Spooner...back... Man and machine...struggling...Spooner...losing his footing...falling...The Maintenance Robot...LOOMING over him... Spooner's HAND...whips back...grabbing his back-up WEAPON...squeezing off some SHOTS...into the Robot's arm...it breaks off... Spooner...scrambling back...continues FIRING...the Robot...jerking back...a macabre dance...until Spooner...runs out of bullets... The Robot...recovers...grabbing the gun from Spooner's hand...pistol-whipping him...then picking him up and... HURLING him against the wall...Spooner...watching as FLUID...GUSHES from the Robot's body...the Robot...taking a swing at him which Spooner... BLOCKS...with his right arm...the Robot...ready...to try again...but STALLING...having lost...too much fluid...it TOPPLES...to the ground... Spooner. Exhausted. Beaten to a pulp. His knees, starting to buckle. As he thinks he sees. In the DISTANCE... A ROBOTIC CLEAN-UP CREW...heading down the alley towards them... Spooner. Crashes to the ground. As another ROBOT. Suddenly appears above him. Its FINGERS made up of NEEDLES...as it closes in on him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noooo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 85   INT. HOSPITAL ROOM - DAY                                          85 To BLACKNESS. Coming through, a faint, WHIRRING SOUND.       As we slowly. FADE IN ON... SPOONER'S FACE. Eyes closed. Asleep. Gash above his head. Bruises around his eye. Nose swollen, purplish. His eyes. Slowly. Flutter open.      His brow. Furrowing. At the whirring sound. As he tries.     To figure out. Where he is. Looks down to see... A couple WHITE METAL ROBOTS. With multiple APPENDAGES. Leaning over him. Running LASERS. Over his bruised RIBCAGE... SPOONER. Tries to bolt upright. But his ARMS and LEGS.
