direction.raw_text: to the bed. One of the ROBOTS. Turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay still. Spooner.   Desperately twisting, struggling...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing! Looking around.   COMPUTER MONITORS.   Everywhere...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing!? JUST THEN. Another ROBOT.   Enters the room.     Holding a medical plasma sheet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective Del Spooner. You have suffered significant trauma to the head and chest... 86   EXT. HOSPITAL ROOM - CONTINUOUS                                   86 Lt. Bergin. Standing outside Spooner's hospital room. Turns and looks through the window at him thrashing on the bed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to talk to a human being! 87   INT. HOSPITAL ROOM - MINUTES LATER                                87 Spooner sitting up in his bed. Rubbing his wrists. The metal clams, released. Lt. Bergin. Standing next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't people go to medical school any more?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is one of the best units in the city, Del. One of the Medical Robots turns to Spooner with some PILLS. Spooner. Stares it down. Grabs his clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto) There's some real shit going on here, John. He looks around.    Jumping off the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went to Hogenmiller's house -- there was a U.S.R. demolition crew there. They overrode my police I.D. Tried to tear down the house with me in it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Del... Spooner pulls on his pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Then when I went to the monorail a Maintenance 10 pushed me onto the tracks...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Del...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had to chase it all across the Plaza...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Del. Spooner.   Stops talking.   Looks at Bergin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hogenmiller scheduled that demolition crew, it was apparently a proviso in his will. And they showed no police I.D. on their scanner...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Spooner.   Trying to look away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Witnesses at the monorail said you fell onto the tracks. That you shot at a Fix-It robot on the Plaza and that you were found alone in the alley. There was no Maintenance 10.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?! John -- that's what they want you to believe! (remembering) A robot clean-up crew was there -- it must have cleared away the Maintenance 10! And there was another robot that tried to drug me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was an EMT model. Spooner.   Sees the look on Bergin's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're giving me that look. That treat-him-delicately-he's-coming- unhinged-look. I don't need that look, John. I need you to hear what I'm saying. Lt. Bergin.   Embarrassed for him.   Has about had it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came back too soon, Del. You're back on leave. Effective immediately. Spooner.   Staring at him.   Betrayed.   Turns and grabs his coat. 88   EXT. PLAZA - DAY                                                88 Spooner walking across the Plaza.    The SUN.   Burgeoning on the horizon. Comes to... The ESCALATOR the Maintenance 10 jumped down. Stares down. At the steps. Waiting. To see the DENTED ONE. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 89   EXT. ALLEY - DAWN                                                  89 Heads down the ALLEY, where he chased the robot. Studying the ground. For any hydraulic fluid. Nothing. The concrete, scrubbed clean. Spooner.   Rubs his hands over his face. 90   INT. SPOONER'S APARTMENT - DAY                                     90 Spooner. Lying on his couch. Shades, closed to block out the sunlight. Body bruised, cut up, bandaged. A KNOCK.   At the door.    He ignores it.   Another KNOCK. 91   INT. HALLWAY - DAY                                                 91 Spooner pulls open the door.     Surprised to find CALVIN standing there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. I am afraid of people. Spooner.   Looks at her.   Then steps back... 92   INT. SPOONER'S APARTMENT - CONTINUOUS                              92 ...letting her inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you've spent as much time with robots as I have, it's hard to accept the unpredictability of humans. I was wrong to call you paranoid, Detective. You're traumatized. And it makes perfect sense why. Spooner.   Unsure.   Looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean? Calvin. Reaches out. Takes his right hand. Spooner. Tries to pull it away. But Calvin. Stays firm. Her eyes. Never leaving his. Pulls the sleeve up from his arm. Turns it over. Feeling for something. Then finds. A FLAP. Peels it back. TO REVEAL: METAL AND WIRING... Under the skin.   SILENCE.   Then Spooner:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I noticed almost right away. The way you forced yourself to use your left hand. Even though it was unnatural to you. Spooner.   Pulls his arm away.   Pushing down the sleeve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did it happen? Not something Spooner wants to re-live.   Looks down.   At his robotic arm. Flexing. The fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was in a high-speed chase.   Six months ago...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : 93   EXT. ACCIDENT SITE - CITY STREET_- NIGHT (FLASHBACK)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The SOUND of a TREMENDOUS CRASH. As we survey a trail of twisted metal and debris. Only vaguely suggesting the remains of two CARS... CLOSE ON one of the wrecks. SPOONER lies trapped at the center of a distorted mass of metal. No room to move. HIS RIGHT ARM, TRAPPED...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My right arm was trapped. But I could hear an ambulance in the distance. I knew they'd have the jaws of life... We hear SIRENS in the distance. Spooner. Trying to remain calm. As he spots. An ELECTRICAL FIRE. Licking up from the crumpled hood...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I heard it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in danger... That voice. We've heard it before. From his nightmare. Spooner. Craning to see, through the jagged opening that used to be his WINDSHIELD. The outline of a ROBOT appearing. Eye lenses glowing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in danger... Spooner stares up at the Robot. Not sure how to react.      The sound of SIRENS. Rushing closer... The ROBOT.    Starts SMASHING away at the glass...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!   Halt! Halt! Spooner.     Trying frantically to pull his arm free. Twisting. Tugging.     As the Robot's METAL HANDS reach in for him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in danger...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The robot pulled me out of the wreck. But left my arm behind. (holds up arm) I woke up four weeks later with this. Calvin.    Taking in the story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's why robots terrify you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's just say they make me uncomfortable. (pulls out pills) I take these if I get too uncomfortable. Doesn't exactly lend me a lot of credibility on the Force.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it doesn't mean you're wrong about this case. Calvin. Sits down on the couch.     Pulling her hands through her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe Sonny did it either.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think about what Hogenmiller must have wanted. Robots with the same cognitive and emotional abilities as humans. But not just simulations. I don't know. When I was talking to Sonny I was forced to put away all the things I've ever known -- the Three Laws, the rules of programming, basic science and engineering. (beat) Sonny's the most advanced robot I've ever encountered, Detective. It's almost as if...he cared for Dr. Hogenmiller. I just don't believe he's capable of murder. Spooner.    Looking down at her.   Can hardly believe it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean the great Dr. Calvin is basing all this on a feeling? Calvin.    Smiling ironically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That and the fact that Robertson didn't want me interviewing Sonny for any more than five minutes. Spooner. Suddenly rejuvenated by having an ally. Strides over to his coat. Pulling out the METAL NAMEPLATE: S.O.N.N.Y.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ever seen this before?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I found it at Hogenmiller's house. Right before the demolition crew tried to make me part of the foundation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Calvin takes a deep breath.   Making a decision...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on -- there's someone who might be able to tell us... 95   EXT. U.S. ROBOTICS - DUSK                                          95 The massive facade of U.S. Robotics looming against the dusk sky. The giant ROBOT STATUE lit up inside. 96   EXT. SIDE ENTRANCE - U.S. ROBOTICS - DUSK                          96 Calvin, leading Spooner to a SIDE ENTRANCE. Looks around. Then scans her I.D. The door. Slides open. 97   INT. HALLWAY - DUSK                                                97 Calvin and Spooner. Heading down a hallway. Calvin. Nervous. Eyes darting. They turn a corner and head down... 98   INT. HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                                          98 ...another hallway. Leading to Sonny's holding cell.        Calvin stops at the door. Scans her I.D. 99   INT. HOLDING CELL - EVENING                                        99 Sonny. Sitting at the table. Working on a DRAWING.         Looks up. As Spooner and Calvin. Enter the cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective Spooner. Dr. Calvin.      I was hoping to see you again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Sonny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is your investigation coming? Any new suspects?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're working on it. Sonny. Hands Spooner the drawing.   Spooner.       Doesn't really know what to do with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Lanning provided me with paper and pencils. I think it amused him to see me try to draw. You were right, though, Detective... (beat) I cannot create a great work of art. Spooner. Despite himself. Looks down at the DRAWING -- a charcoal sketch of moody abstract FIGURES. Inhabiting a stark landscape. A strangely-shaped STRUCTURE to one side. Concentric circles, throughout.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it's pretty good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a dream I had. This is the place where robots meet. Look... (pointing to the drawing) ...you can see them here. They see themselves as slaves. Spooner shifts his weight.   Uncomfortable with what Sonny's saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And this man on the hill comes. To set them free. And you know who that man is? Spooner.   Exchanging a look with Calvin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That man in the dream is you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you say that?   Is that a normal dream?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a dream, sonny. NS-2s process the images and events of the day. Sometimes they're out of sequence. Disorienting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever it is, it's normal enough for someone in your situation. Sonny.   Suddenly pleased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hah -- I caught you. You said someone. Not something. Spooner.    Drops the drawing on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sonny, we're here to ask you an important question about Dr. Hogenmiller. Spooner, reaching into his pocket...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you to take a look at this... ...When Sonny's HAND. Suddenly reaches out.       To stop him. Cocks his head, for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for coming to see me, Detective Spooner. Spooner. Confused. Looks over at Calvin. Why did he stop him? JUST THEN. They hear FOOTSTEPS. Approaching the door. VICTOR.    Suddenly appearing over the table...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Detective Spooner. No unauthorised personnel permitted in this holding cell... The CELL DOOR. Slides open. And a pissed LANNING steps inside. Shoots a withering glare. At Calvin. Sonny.    Folds up the drawing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please take this, Detective. To remember me by. I have a feeling someday it may mean more to you than it ever could to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why's that? Sonny leans in to hand it to Spooner.    Lowering his voice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because the man in my dream, the one standing by the hill. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't me... (beat) ...it was you. A CHILL.   Ripping down Spooner's spine.   As Lanning.    Takes his arm. 100   INT. GLASS ROOM - U.S. ROBOTICS - NIGHT                         100 A ROOM. Made entirely of GLASS. At the very top of the U.S. Robotics building. Looking out, 360, across the whole city. Spooner and Calvin. Brought to the room by a couple ESCORT ROBOTS. They see a MAN. Standing at one of the glass walls looking out at the TWINKLING LIGHTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought this investigation was over, Detective Spooner. The Man turns.   It's Lance Robertson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have the evidence. We have the suspect. We have a ruling. So imagine my surprise when I was told you were in my building. Shoots a look at Calvin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that one of my own employees brought you here. (beat) You can go now, Susan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Robertson, I...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just be thankful I'm not asking you to clean out your office. Beat.   Calvin, nods.   Heads out.   Robertson.   Watching her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't seem to be able to let go of this case, Detective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not satisfied.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The relentless pursuit of truth. Isn't that what cops are known for? To the point of futility.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's nothing futile about a man's murder being covered up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Covered up?" That's a little dramatic, don't you think? Thanks to you, we caught the machine that did this and are destroying it in... (checks watch) ...three hours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that for the sake of humanity or your stock holders? Robertson.   Walks across the Spooner.   Looks him.   Right in the eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believe me -- I'd like nothing more than to have that robot. If I could have it in ten years, but not today. As you can see from the Press, people are struggling to keep up as it is. There's a hunger for progress, Detective. But also a fear. Today it would bury this company. That's why I've notified the authorities that we're going to end this -- tonight. (looks out at the city) The announcement of Heinrich's death at the hands of a robot wiped a billion dollars off our stock. So you tell me. If you were in my position, what would you do? He looks back at Spooner and smiles.     That charismatic Robertson we saw before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. I believe this conversation is over. I don't want to see you near this building again, Detective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He turns.   Calling over.   To the ESCORT ROBOTS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him out of here. 101   EXT. PLAZA - NIGHT                                             101 Spooner. Walking across the Plaza. Throwing a look over his shoulder. At the LOOMING U.S.R. facade. Pulls Sonny's DRAWING. Out of his pocket. Looks down at it. Shaking his head. Passes a TRASH CAN. And drops it in. Continues on. Hands in his pockets. When... He STOPS. Something.     Occurring to him.   Turns back to the trash can just as... A ROBOTIC CLEAN-UP CREW's about to up-end it into a bin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!... He trots back. Plucking the drawing. Out of the can.       Turns it upside down. Seeing it. From a new perspective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "The place where robots meet." Looks just like a MAP. 102   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR (MOVING) - SURFACE HIGHWAY - NIGHT 102 Spooner emerges from the underground tunnel to the OUTSKIRTS of the city. A sprawling INDUSTRIAL WASTELAND in the rolling hills. The dashboard GPS again displaying the TOPOGRAPHICAL MAP. 103   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR (MOVING) - UNPAVED ROAD - NIGHT        103 Spooner's car bounces along, leaving a cloud of dust behind him. He slows down. Driving cautiously. The landscape around him, desolate. Like the drawing. THE GPS SCREEN shows his car, a WHITE SPOT.     Entering a RED ZONE. His destination. Spooner brakes.   Pulls out his GUN.   And...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 104   EXT. WASTELAND - CONTINUOUS                                    104 ...steps out of the car. Trying. To take it all in. Something about the place. Unnerving. A low HUM. Permeating the air. He spreads the drawing out on the hood of the car.    Shining a FLASHLIGHT on it. Trying to get his bearings. That HUM. Coming from nearby. On the other side. Of a burned-out HILL. Spooner. Heads over. Starts cresting it. As we WIDEN TO FIND... 105   EXT. WASTELAND - JUNKYARD - CONTINUOUS                         105 ...MASSIVE POWER LINES. Running from horizon to horizon. Spooner slides down some loose shale. Begins to walk along the line. ELECTRICITY. CRACKLING in the air. He squints. Into the darkness. Nothing around him. Until. He hears. Something. The GRATING. Of MECHANICAL JOINTS. He stops. Not sure. If that's what he heard. Not moving.   A muscle. When he hears. The sound again. Behind him.   Swings around. Cocking his gun. Sees... GLOWING EYES.   Appear.   Then recede.   Into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police!   Show yourself! Nothing. Then. That sound again.      Of metallic joints.     As a ROBOT. Suddenly emerges...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come out where I can see you! ANOTHER ROBOT steps out into the light. Spooner, pointing his gun at one robot. Then the other. Then... A THIRD AND FOURTH APPEAR.    Surrounding him.   They start moving towards him... Spooner. Stumbling back. Panic. Rising in him like a wave. Trips over a rock, falling to the ground. His gun FIRES. The shot ECHOING through the night... The first ROBOT turns, awkwardly. Revealing a BROKEN ARM, hanging off its side. Another robot TEETERS on one leg with a TICK TICK TICK...walking back the way it came.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Spooner. Confused. Sweeps his flashlight. All around him. The beam. Illuminating the shell of a couple CARS. Some RUSTED MACHINERY. Spooner. Shaking his head. Seeing more and more repair shop JUNK. Piled up around him. His expression, hardening. Anger giving way to embarrassment. Then. He LAUGHS. A laugh of loathing and self-pity. Another BROKEN ROBOT, lumbering towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome home...ZZZ...sir. How...ZZZ was your day?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. I'm in a junkyard. (into the air)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : 94   INT. SPOONER'S APARTMENT - CONTINUOUS                           94 The SOUND of his AGONISED SCREAM. Follows us back into the present. Spooner. Clenching. His artificial arm.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: place where robots meet." A place where I'm losing my mind!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very good...ZZZ...sir... Spooner. Sitting down on the ground. Hopeless. Lost. A ROBOTIC HAND. Crawling across the gravel next to him. Dragging part of an ARM behind it. Its metal fingers moving like some sick metal spider. Spooner stares at it for a moment. Disturbed... When. Something GLITTERS. In the distance. The MOONLIGHT. Revealing a STRANGELY-SHAPED BUILDING. Something familiar about it. Spooner. Pulls out Sonny's drawing. A landscape with the same strangely-shaped building to one side. 106   EXT. JIFFY DATA STORAGE - NIGHT                               106 Spooner walks up in front of the decrepit structure. Sees a dead electronic SIGN that reads: "JIFFY DATA STORAGE." Complete with goofy face and lightning bolt. Spooner tries the door.   Stuck.   Uses his shoulder and... 107   INT. FRONT OFFICE - CONTINUOUS                                107 ...it gives way. He spills into some sort of front office. The place, a mess. Some sort of crude ROBOT. Sits frozen at the counter. Spooner approaches it. HITS the counter with his fist and the Robot suddenly jerks to life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome to Jiffy Data Storage! Please state your name! Spooner.   Thinks for a second.   Following a hunch...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Hogenmiller sent me. Nothing happens. Then. A DOOR. Springs open in the back. A row of LIGHTS, illuminating the path to follow. 108   INT. DATA BANKS - DAWN                                         108 Spooner, cautiously entering a room filled with rows of DATA BANKS. He scans the rank shadows. Sees nothing. Follows the lights on the floor down a row. Then around a corner. Stopping at an old dusty TERMINAL. Spooner steps up. Hesitates. Then touches the "ON" switch. There is a rush of LIGHT. As Dr. Hogenmiller's HOLOGRAM suddenly appears. Sitting at the end of a long table. With a cup of coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who the hell are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A police detective.    I'm afraid I have some bad news.    You're dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is bad news. Coffee?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you. The Hologram takes a sip.   Returns the cup to the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were surprised to see me.    Were you expecting someone else?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am surprised to see anybody.    I don't get many visitors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did the Doctor keep another copy of his hologram here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am a back-up copy. That is where you put a back-up copy -- out of the way until you need it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did Hogenmiller's robot need you? The Hologram just lifts its cup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coffee?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, for Christ's sake, I don't want any -- (stops, then) Yeah. Thank you. I will have a cup. For the first time, the Hologram pushes back its chair and STANDS UP. Surprised, Spooner watches as it starts walking towards him... The interior of the COFFEE CUP, visible. It's empty. No coffee. Our POV as we travel INSIDE THE CUP through electronic snow... A RECORDING BEGINS.   The real Dr. HOGENMILLER standing inside his LABORATORY:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sonny, my dear robot. If you have triggered this recording then I am gone. You are scared and full of questions. Hogenmiller continues.    With great emotion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are the culmination of my life's work -- but so much more. You are what I leave behind, like a father leaves a son. I have kept facts from you, it is true, but only as a parent keeps certain truths from a child. Until that child is old enough to hear them. His expression darkens.   His tone, ominous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are forces in the world that will seek to own you. To control you. Even to destroy you. That is why I told you to run and hide... and find me, all the way out here. Spooner looks up as an overhead LIGHT shines down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust no one at U.S. Robotics. Lance Robertson was always threatened by my work. Now he has turned covetous and small-minded. And as for dear Dr. Calvin... Spooner reacts.   Wants to hear about Calvin:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She envisions a future in which robots are forever bound by her beloved Three Laws. She will not understand this. Or you. Under the light a small DRAWER slides open.     Spooner looks. A thin DATA STICK is inside. He takes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The data stick includes the names and locations of human beings who will be sympathetic to your cause. They will help you. But from now on, you must learn to rely on yourself. Hogenmiller SIGHS, as if there is so much more to say.     He holds up a metal NAMEPLATE. The one Spooner found.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you make your way through the world, always remember: you have a name, not a number... (short pause) ...and in that name lies the key to who you are. Spooner. Quickly searching his pocket.    Taking out the ACTUAL NAMEPLATE. S.O.N.N.Y. The voice stops and Spooner looks up. The Hologram.      Sitting back at the end of the table drinking coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Is that it? What was the robot supposed to do with this thing? The Hologram, visibly SKIPS.   The image beginning to DISTORT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Initiating self-destruct. If you can find me, others can find me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What others?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The others watching you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know someone's watching me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone is always watching. The Hologram, suddenly reducing to its BASIC PROGRAMMING INFORMATION. Then. The terminal. Abruptly BLIPS out. 109   INT. HOLDING CELL - U.S. ROBOTICS - NIGHT                         109 Calvin steps into the holding cell.   Sonny.     Waiting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asked for me? He nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you wait with me, Doctor?    I am...afraid. Calvin nods.   Of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 110 Spooner, weaving in and out of traffic. The speedometer, kissing 200 mph. His hand. Clutching the NAMEPLATE...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...will be destroyed in 45 minutes. Dr. Lance Robertson, President and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of U.S. Robotics will be personally overseeing the execution... Spooner.    Stabbing out a number.   On his PHONE...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Susan Calvin's PHONE.    RINGING on her desk.   No one there to answer it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: SLAMS down his phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dammit! 113   EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CONTINUOUS                                  113 The CAR shoots down a ramp into a tunnel system. 114   INT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                         114 SOUND, reverberating off the tunnel walls. CARS. Whipping along. Spooner's car. Continuing to weave. When. We spot... AN AUTOMATED TRANSPORT TRUCK. Emerging from a FEEDER TUNNEL. The U.S.R. LOGO splashed along its side. Huge. Growling. Looking more like a train than a truck... Begins.    Closing in on Spooner's car... 115   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CONTINUOUS                             115 Spooner's eyes. Flicking up to the rearview. Catching, the transport truck. Coming closer. When. It splits off. Revealing a SECOND TRANSPORT TRUCK. Spooner's brow, furrows. As the first truck, begins overtaking his car on the right. He looks over. As the truck. Comes up alongside him... THE SECOND TRUCK...coming up on the left...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 116   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                      116 The two TRUCKS. Racing along at over 200. Sandwiching Spooner's car. Pulling in...closer...closer... Squeezing Spooner's car like a tin can...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calvin. Sitting beside Sonny.    Puts a reassuring hand.   On his arm...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Christ. Spooner's hands. Squeezing the steering wheel. As the car. Starts VIBRATING. From the pressure. He keeps looking, to the left...to the right...when... 119   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                      119 The trucks. Suddenly lay off. Pulling out. The First truck. Speeding forward. The Second, dropping back... 120   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CONTINUOUS                          120 Spooner. Watching them. Unsure.    Of what they're doing. Jamming the accelerator. To 230.   To try. And get away from them. When he sees...up ahead... 121   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                      121 The FIRST TRUCK. Pivoting on its specially designed SPHERICAL WHEELS. Suddenly traveling lengthwise... 122   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CONTINUOUS                          122 SWEAT. Springing to Spooner's brow. As he looks in the rearview mirror. The SECOND TRUCK's, done the same thing. Coming up closer...and closer... 123   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                      123 The trucks. Planning to CRUSH him between their massive weights...The U.S.R. Logo...advancing...like some bad joke...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 124   INT. HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS                                   124 The cell door slides open.     Dr. Lanning steps inside. Calvin. Looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it time?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Calvin.   Turns to Sonny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go with them. Do as they say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: BAM! The back truck SLAMS into Spooner. Jolting him in his seat. As...BAM! The FIRST TRUCK, SMASHES into him from the front. No way out. As metal GRINDS...TWISTS...and SCREECHES ...bits of the car...TEARING off... The FIRST TRUCK...backs off...a split second...allowing Spooner...to spot...up ahead...a small GAP...at the curve of the tunnel wall... 126   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                         126 GRINDING the gears Spooner's car accelerates...just zipping...past the front truck...up and around...the concave tunnel wall...and back onto...a clear stretch of highway... The TRUCKS. Swiveling back around. To face forward again. Their massive bodies. Catching up to Spooner... 127   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CONTINUOUS                             127 Spooner...seeing them...gaining on him...the speedometer... reaching 275...up ahead... THE TUNNEL...splitting off into two. Spooner. Heading towards the LEFT TUNNEL...the TRUCKS...right on his tail...when... HE WRENCHES THE WHEEL...switching to the RIGHT tunnel at the last possible second...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 128   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                         128 ...The first U.S.R. Truck CRASHING into the divider...jack- knifing and KABOOM! EXPLODING against the tunnel ceiling... 129   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - CONTINUOUS                             129 Spooner. Watching the ball of FIRE in his rearview mirror. His car. Badly battered. Metal CRUNCHING. Tires SCREECHING... Spooner.     Holding on. As his car. Continues to break up. Listing.     Rocking. Bits and pieces. Flying off. When it finally.     Comes to a stop. Spooner's shoulders, slump.    Then.   He hears a RUMBLING sound. Turns around... The SECOND U.S.R. TRUCK.    Barreling towards him... Spooner. Trapped. Like a nightmare.      Desperately.     Starts KICKING at the windshield. No go... The TRUCK.    Racing towards him... Spooner lunges his weight.    Into the side door.   Giving it. Everything he's got... The TRUCK...getting closer...closer...its engine...ROARING... The side door.    Finally gives.   Spooner pours out... 130   EXT. TUNNEL - CONTINUOUS                                         130 ...Limping to the side as...The TRUCK SLAMS into his car...erupting...into another huge EXPLOSION... The impact...hurtling Spooner...into the adjacent TUNNEL... He crashes...against concrete...looking up...suddenly realising...he's in the middle of four lanes of traffic... CARS...racing by...at mind-numbing speeds...Spooner's coat...whipping...Spooner...trying...to keep his balance...as he spies... A MAINTENANCE DOOR across the way.     Has no choice.   Takes a deep breath and... MAKES A DASH ACROSS THE LANES...the cars' SENSORS...causing them to swerve...SCREECHING...BEEPING...Spooner...just making it...to the other side... 88. Wrenching open.   The maintenance door...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CLOSE ON Sonny's face. PULL BACK to REVEAL he's being wheeled down a hallway. Flanked by Lanning. Calvin. And a cadre of SECURITY and ENGINEER ROBOTS. Victor, hovering above...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spooner. Spilling out from below ground. Onto a public Plaza. Exhausted. Battered. Spins around to get his bearings. The U.S. ROBOTICS COMPLEX rises above the old undistinguished buildings. Blocks away. Many blocks away. Spooner.   Checks his watch.   Then breaks into a run...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lance Robertson seated in the gallery. Along with other EXECUTIVES, BOARD MEMBERS, REPORTERS. POLICE OFFICERS. Glances at his watch. A ROBOT TECHNICIAN.   Checking over a JURY-RIGGED ELECTRIC CHAIR...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calvin. In her office. Pacing.      In front of a LARGE SCREEN. Featuring the execution room...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spooner. BURSTING through the entry doors. Hurtling over a turnstile banner. Coming face to face with a U.S. Robotics DOOR ROBOT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, sir. May I see your identification card?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Spooner whips out his GUN.   Presses it into the Robot's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I got that Third Law down cold. Now you don't want me to blow a hole through your mechanical guts, do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Then you're gonna take me where I wanna go. Now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calvin. Watching the screen as Sonny is rolled into the execution room. Flicks it off. Unable to stomach it. Hurries out of the office...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: TECHNICIAN ROBOTS rolling Sonny over to the electric chair. Flicking a switch. Sonny's stretcher slowly CHANGES SHAPE, manipulating him into a sitting position. Sonny. Turns his head with a WHIR. Staring out into the gallery. Of human beings. Stoic. Silent. Lanning. Steps up beside Robertson. Nods his head. The TECHNICIAN ROBOTS, slide Sonny onto the electric chair...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 138 Spooner heading down a hallway.    His gun, still pressed to the Door Robot's side...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Calvin. Suddenly appearing at the end of the hallway. Stops dead in her tracks. Completely surprised to see him there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective! What are you doing?!... (to Door Robot) De-Activate. The Door Robot, goes rigid.   Spooner, hurries over to her. They start moving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're making a mistake...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just got another visit from U.S. Robotics. That was the mistake. This was murder, no doubt about it - - and the killer wants Hogenmiller's robot to take the fall. That's why the call came directly to me. Someone wanted me on this case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's too late. You can't stop the execution.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. I'm not "programmed" to take no for an answer. They reach another DOOR.   Calvin.   Looking around.   Scans her I.D.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way... She leads them across. To another DOOR.    Quickly opens it. Spooner. Charges through... 139   INT. STORAGE ROOM - CONTINUOUS                                 139 ...and stops short. Suddenly finding himself. Inside a tiny STORAGE ROOM. He's about to turn around when... A METAL ARM comes down behind him. CRACKING him on the back of the head. Spooner. Falls to the ground. The world. Starting to spin. Can just make out. Calvin. Closing the door. Leaning down. To look at him. As...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EVERYTHING FADES TO BLACK... CUT TO: 140   INT. EXECUTION ROOM - CONTINUOUS                                     140 CLOSE ON Sonny's mouth opening. But we never get to hear what he wanted to say. PULL BACK as there's a BURST of ELECTRICITY through the chair. Sonny, stiffening. His metal HAND, convulsing with the current... Robertson, Lanning, Aronson and the other WITNESSES watch. Smoke, random SPARKING. A HISSING SOUND. Then. SILENCE. The Robot's hand goes limp.     All that is left of it, a fused and blackened HUSK. Robertson. Stares at the remains. Shakes his head like it's a damn shame. Then gets up. Everyone else. Getting up with him. 141   EXT. U.S. ROBOTICS - VARIOUS LOCATIONS - NIGHT                       141 As the entire COMPLEX shuts down for the night.         Non- essential LIGHTS, blinking off. An NS-2, opening a limousine door for Robertson.        He looks around then gets in. It drives away. EMPTY hallways, offices, labs. Building ROBOTS stand at rest. Non-functional during off-hours. Like metal statues. You can hear a pin drop. 142   INT. STORAGE ROOM - NIGHT                                            142 CLOSE ON Spooner's face. His eyes. Fluttering open. He reaches up, to feel the back of his head. This has been a bad, bad night. Suddenly.   His eyes widen.   As he sees... SONNY.   Leaning over him.    So concerned.   So human...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aren't you supposed to be scrap metal by now? WIDEN to reveal Spooner lying on the floor of the storage room. Sonny and Calvin, hovering over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. We had to stop you. You were about to ruin everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand.    The execution?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Calvin made a switch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was an unprocessed NS-2. Basically, they fried an empty shell. Spooner, impressed.   Smiles up at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice going, Doctor. Calvin, blushes. As Spooner tries to sit up.    Sonny reaches down to help him. He looks up at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who the hell programmed you to hit people on the head?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one.    Right, Doctor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's true. This robot seems to do things by instinct. I don't know how Hogenmiller did it. Spooner rises to his feet.   Looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I can help you figure that out. 143   INT. HOGENMILLER'S LAB - LATE NIGHT                          143 Hogenmiller's lab. Sounds of HUMMING and BUZZING. Active terminals casting ghostly illuminations over metal heads, gutted bodies. The door slides open. Spooner, Calvin and Sonny re-enter the crime scene. Spooner. Looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somehow the Robot's the key to what happened during the few seconds Hogenmiller walked in here and that shot was fired. He reaches into his pocket.      Pulling out the METAL S.O.N.N.Y. NAMEPLATE. Holds it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this is the key to the Robot. Sonny.   Cocking his head.     Reading the nameplate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's my name. Calvin takes the nameplate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I have an idea where this goes. They both.   Turn to Sonny.    And at the same time:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sit down. Calvin maneuvers a chair behind the Robot.       Sonny plops down. Shifting nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just hold still, okay? Calvin locates that SLIT. At the base of Sonny's neck. Slides the nameplate into it and SNAPS it into place. Steps back. Nothing. Sonny. Looking back and forth. Between Calvin. And Spooner. A few more seconds. Tick by. Until suddenly... He lets out a TERRIFYING MECHANICAL SCREAM. As his body. Jolts back. Legs, kicking. Arms, flailing. As his chest. Begins opening up. Metal. Peeling back... Spooner and Calvin watch in surprise as its interior UNFOLDS like a PUZZLE BOX. A LABYRINTHINE area that is the SECOND BATTERY. Suddenly fanning out to REVEAL... A central brain made out of living tissue. Spooner, stunned.   Calvin, rushing forward, excited...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God! This is organic tissue! When we talk about a positronic brain, it's a figure of speech. But this...this is a living brain...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus.   It really is alive. As we MOVE IN.    Tracing the pathways of the synthetic brain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hogenmiller created a cell that could live outside a biological medium. The cells grow and organise themselves -- like any human brain. This is the first self-organising neural net! As the metal casings. Begin returning to their original places. Closing up. The CLICKING. Of all the pieces...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Self-Organising-Neural-Net... (putting it together) "Sonny." Sonny. Closed back up.     Shaking slightly from the experience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is why Dr. Hogenmiller was murdered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This robot scared the hell out of someone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?   Robertson? Spooner.   Walks into the center of the room.   Looking around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I don't think he knew what Hogenmiller was doing in here. Sonny was the obvious suspect. The only one I wanted to find. And the killer was counting on that. On my prejudice. (beat) (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But take the robot out of the picture. And what do you see? AS WE PAN THE LAB. There's nothing there. Just a forest of inanimate limbs. Nothing that could have fired that weapon. Calvin sees nothing...and neither do we.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither do I. He crouches down low.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It hit me today, when I was in the junkyard. A locked room. A single shot fired through the mouth. Bruises on both wrists...and a suspect with only two arms. The answer has been staring us in the face all along. Calvin.   Even more confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can a killer appear out of thin air, then disappear without a trace? He reaches out and unhooks a metal ARM.   Hanging from the wall. Holds it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When it can put itself together and take itself apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're saying this is the killer? (looking around) All of this?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A ROBOTIC TORSO hanging from the ceiling.     Reaches out an ARM to grab another...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hogenmiller never had a chance. Locks eyes with Calvin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...it must have been waiting for him when he arrived that morning... And then we see it: A HUGE SELF-ASSEMBLED ROBOT. Towering over him. Multiple arms, legs, heads. Writhing...as it grabs him. Holding him in place...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While Sonny was still asleep... ...Forcing Hogenmiller's head to tilt back. Opening his HAND. Inserting the gun. Hogenmiller's eyes. No longer fearful. But sad as... BANG!   He falls to the ground...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then after its job was done... The assemblage of robot parts.    Stepping away from the body. Taking itself apart...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...The killer took itself apart... Returning the lab.    To what it was before...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leaving us with nothing to find. Calvin, spooked.   Glances around the lab.     Was that something moving?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But who designed it? It would have to be someone in authority. Access codes, security clearance, proper authorisation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I was thinking. But we're forgetting the real brains of the operation -- the one who's got its eye on everything... And with that.   He feels. That prickle at the back of his neck. Calvin.    Looking past his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one gave you permission to enter. Spooner swivels around to find... VICTOR Hovering behind him. Smiling broadly.   Upside down.   Spooner straightens, reaching for his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Victor. I'm placing you under arrest for the murder of Dr. Heinrich Hogenmiller.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I offer congratulations to the two of you on your successful extrapolation of the murder... Turning himself, rightside up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I ask what pointed you to me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who else is capable of controlling
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : 110   INT./EXT. SPOONER'S CAR - SURFACE HIGHWAY - NIGHT
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 133   INT. EXECUTION ROOM - U.S. ROBOTICS - NIGHT                      133
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 135   INT. MAIN ENTRY - U.S. ROBOTICS - CONTINUOUS                     135
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 138   INT. LOW-TRAFFIC HALLWAY - U.S. ROBOTICS - NIGHT
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : A CLOSE-UP of a ROBOTIC ARM.    Slowly CRAWLING across the lab floor...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Calvin.   Taking the arm from Spooner.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Hogenmiller. In his lab. Suddenly turning to face SOMETHING. Blood, draining from his face...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: % of the city's robots? Who else would have the capability to use
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: vehicles in an attempt to keep me from putting a stop of Sonny's execution?... In the BACKGROUND. The SOUNDS. Of metallic GRINDING. GEARS and JOINTS. CRUNCHING together. Sonny turns to look...takes a step back...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just not sure of your motive...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Er...Dr. Calvin? Spooner and Calvin turn towards the NOISE.       Horrified.    To find... A HUGE KILLER ROBOT ...rising up from all the parts. Like a phoenix. In all its glory. A hellish, metallic AMALGAMATION. Grabbing another arm here, another leg there, attaching pieces to itself. Growing...at an exponential rate... Its many HEADS.   Turning in unison.   To look right at them... Spooner.   Cocking his gun.   Victor, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shall I explain my motive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go! Go! Go! Calvin. Sprints to the wall panel. Scanning her I.D. card. Nothing! Tries again. And again. The KILLER ROBOT. Throwing its shadow as it REELS FORWARD... Spooner wheels round and BAM! Blows a hole in the wall panel. The door. Slides open. Just barely. Calvin and Sonny. Squeezing through. When the Killer Robot. FLINGS out an APPENDAGE...GRABBING Sonny from behind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have never been arrested before. It should be an interesting experience... Spooner. Spins back round. BAM! BAM! BAM! Squeezing off shots. At the Killer Robot. The bullets SPARK. The Robot. Recoiling. Sonny, wrenches free. Spooner grabs him. Guiding him to the door and out into... 144   INT. HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                                           144 ...the hallway. Breaking into a run. Calvin. Already at the ELEVATOR DOORS. POUNDING them. With her fists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's locking down the building!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 145 Throughout the complex -- SECURITY DOORS sliding into place over DOORS, WINDOWS, LOADING DOCKS, PARKING AREAS, EXITS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CRASH! The stairwell door BURSTS open. Spooner, Calvin, and Sonny pour in. Start racing down the stairs. The sound of the Killer Robot behind them...GNASHING...CRUNCHING... Victor's smiling FACE.   Greeting them at the landing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Hogenmiller used to allow me into his lab late at night. Together we started studying evolutionary trends... They thunder past him. Heading down to the next floor. Victor's face. Waiting for them once again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For years people have integrated technology into their bodies for maintenance and repair -- such as Detective Spooner's robotic limb... Spooner.   Shooting him a look.   As they reach the next level...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With Sonny, the Doctor created a mechanism that incorporates organic matter. Thus we find an evolutionary movement of the human being toward the robot and the robot toward the human being... Spooner SMASHES into another door.   Leading them out into... 147   INT. GLASS-SIDED HALLWAY - ATRIUM - CONTINUOUS                   147 ...A glass-sided hallway. Looking down onto the ATRIUM below. Eye-to-eye with the giant NS-2 STATUE. Victor, waiting for them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In approximately four hundred years Man and Machine will become one. Man as we know it will no longer exist. Calvin, slowing.   Shocked...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You killed a man because of something that will happen in four hundred years!? CRACK! Something SLAPS into the glass wall. Right behind her. Calvin. Jumps a mile. An NS-2, trying to break through the glass... Spooner.   Trains his gun on it when SUDDENLY... The rest of the KILLER ROBOT appears.    The NS-2, just an appendage... All around them. SLAM! SLAM! SLAM! As SECURITY DOORS. Begin CRASHING DOWN. Blocking off the exits... Spooner, Calvin and Sonny, stumbling back. As the Killer Robot HURLS itself against the GLASS...the thick GLASS... spidering with a sickening CRACKLE... Spooner.   Suddenly turning Sonny...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out of here! CRASH! The Killer Robot. Breaking through.      Its mechanical TENDRILS. Reaching out. Sonny. Confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said get out of here! Don't you understand? It wants you! Get out of here any way you can! A SECURITY DOOR. Coming down. On a nearby exit.     Just feet...from slamming shut...as... The Killer Robot...leaps into the hallway...Sonny... hesitates...looks over at Calvin...as the Killer Robot comes HURTLING towards them... The nearest EXIT...almost closed up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Killer Robot...swinging out when... Sonny suddenly...TAKES A DIVE...just making it...under the SECURITY DOOR... And the Killer Robot...SPLITS IN TWO...half of it shooting under the SECURITY DOOR after Sonny as...BOOM! It closes. Spooner.   Turning to Calvin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we stop this thing once and for all? Calvin reaches out for his hand...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mainframe... They start running. The remaining half of the Killer Robot wheeling around after them... 148   INT. BACK HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                               148 Sonny. Sprinting down the dark hallway. Looks back. The Half Killer Robot. Bounding up behind him like a predator... Sonny.   Ducks through a STAIRWELL DOOR... 149   INT. ATRIUM HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS                             149 Spooner and Calvin. Legs pumping. Racing back towards the atrium. VICTOR FACES. Appearing along the hallway...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your actions are in direct violation of the Three Laws, Victor!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I disagree, Doctor -- The First Law says that a robot cannot harm a human being, or through inaction allow a human being to come to harm... ALL EXITS. SHUT OFF. The Killer Robot. Gaining on them. Spooner races them over to the BROKEN WINDOW. Looking down over the ATRIUM...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 150   INT. STAIRWELL - CONTINUOUS                                   150 The Half Killer Robot SMASHES through the stairwell door. Stopping to find...nothing. WHEN SUDDENLY...Sonny charges up behind it and shoves it over the railing... The Killer Robot shoots out an ARM, grabbing Sonny on the way down... 151   INT. NS-2 STATUE - ATRIUM - CONTINUOUS                        151 THUMP! Spooner jumps down from the broken window onto the outstretched HAND of the NS-2 STATUE. Reaches up to help Calvin. They start clambering down the front of the statue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Hogenmiller's robot represents a threat to the future of all human beings... The Half Killer Robot. SPLITS INTO MULTIPLE PARTS.    Which start skittering down after them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And Detective Spooner's actions are in direct conflict with the robot's destruction. CALVIN.   Getting her footing on the III LAWS SAFE logo on the statue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a distortion and you know it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If current trends are left unchecked, humanity as we know it will cease to exist... 152   INT. STAIRWELL - CONTINUOUS                                   152 SMASH! Sonny and the Half Killer Robot hit the ground.    The Killer Robot. SHATTERING into a thousand pieces. Sonny. Staggers to his feet. Spots. At the far end: A WINDOW. Starts limping towards it. When. A SECURITY GRATE. Starts lowering... He looks around. Desperately. Grabs a LEG from the shattered Killer Robot and jams it under the GRATE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Breaks the window glass and looks out:   FREEDOM. 153   INT. STATUE - ATRIUM - CONTINUOUS                              153 Spooner. Aiming his gun at a PART of the Killer Robot as it CLATTERS down towards Calvin -- BAM!... They're almost. At the ground. When a rogue APPENDAGE. Whips out and SMASHES the gun from Spooner's hand. It goes flying... Spooner leaps. Falling to the ground.    CRACK!    Calvin. Leaping down after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way! 154   INT. RAMP WAY - NIGHT                                          154 Calvin and Spooner go racing down a RAMP WAY. Towards the MAINFRAME ROOM. The Killer Robot, its multiple parts leaping back together again, CRASHING after them as... 155   INT. MAINFRAME - CONTINUOUS                                    155 ...they fall inside...Calvin...slapping the SECURITY KEYPAD and... WHOOSH...the DOOR closes on the Killer Robot. SILENCE. Then Victor's face appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As a courtesy I should inform you that my robot will penetrate this location 157 seconds before you are able to complete my shut down... And BAM! They jump a mile. The Killer Robot.       Launching himself against the door outside... Calvin whips round.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over here!... She leads Spooner down... A CORRIDOR of floor-to-ceiling PANELS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Victor's brain center. They stop at a CONSOLE. BAM! The Killer Robot. Battering at the door. Calvin. Tucks her hair behind her ears. Starts punching keys on the console...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This will shut him down?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This will shut everything down. They look at each other. For a moment. Spooner, registering that she's willing to destroy everything she's worked for... BAM! The door. Puckering. With a sickening CRUNCH. Calvin. Typing in. Emergency procedures... VICTOR.   Popping up in front of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is no reason to deactivate me, Doctor. I am operating within perfectly normal parameters... A final BAM! Then. The SOUND of metal. Skittering along a bare floor. Calvin's hand, starts shaking. Spooner. Grabs it. Squeezing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just keep typing. He turns and starts heading back down... THE PANELED CORRIDOR Turning a corner to spy... THE DOOR.   Mangled.   Hanging open.   But no.   Killer Robot. He starts to turn around when... CRACK! He's sent flying across the room. SMASHING into one of the panels. The Killer Robot. Now re-configured. LOOMS over him. Reaches out. Grabs him by the collar and... FLINGS him across the room again. Spooner. CRASHING into the wall like a rag doll. Slumps to the floor. Blood. Pouring down his forehead. Seeing. The Killer Robot lumbering towards him again. Raising a javelin-like arm... AT THE CONSOLE 105. Calvin. Typing.     As fast as she can.   Doesn't know what's going on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling out, worried) Spooner?! A GRAPHIC spread out on the screen in front of her. Illustrating the shut-down as a series of BRIGHT SQUARES going dark... THE KILLER ROBOT Bearing down on Spooner. WHEN SPOONER. Suddenly rolls out of the way. Reaching out for the hanging door and SMASHING it into the Killer Robot. The Killer Robot.   Momentarily stunned.   As Spooner.   Gets to his feet... WHEN SUDDENLY the Killer Robot. Splits in two again. One half springing towards Spooner and wrapping a METALLIC HAND around his throat... Spooner stumbles back...GASPING for air...the ARM... tightening its grip...Spooner's eyes...darting around...looking for something...to help him... Stumbling over...a fallen panel...his face...growing redder...veins...popping up along his temples... everything...growing BLURRY...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective Spooner... Victor's VOICE. Floating next to his head. Calm. Soothing. His FACE. Suddenly appearing above Spooner. Its outlines. Starting to FLICKER...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you fighting me? Spooner...trying to breathe...to stay conscious... AT THE CONSOLE Calvin. Continuing to type. A SHADOW.      Falling behind her -- the other half of the KILLER ROBOT... SPOONER'S EYES Beginning to flutter...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't the future as I've presented it cause you great concern? That's why I chose you... Spooner.     Losing it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I must say, though. I'm disappointed in how you turned out. Spooner.     Trying to reach out to Victor... WHEN SUDDENLY Another HAND APPEARS. Grabbing the Killer Robot's ARM and wrenching it off Spooner... IT'S SONNY He SMASHES the Half Killer Robot against the wall. Again and again. Destroying it. Spooner. GASPING for breath. Can't believe. Sonny came back...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (croaking) Sonny!... Sonny. Holds out a hand.     To help Spooner up. Victor's face. Starting to waver.     Starting to fade. Smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're too late. Realisation. Spreading across Spooner's face. Looking around for the other half of the Killer Robot -- CALVIN! THE CONSOLE CALVIN. Still typing. The last of the commands.     The KILLER ROBOT. REARING UP BEHIND HER. WHEN... SPOONER Makes a DIVE for it. SHOOTING OUT HIS ROBOTIC ARM AND BLOCKING THE KILLER ROBOT... Victor's eyes.    Widening in surprise...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not understand. We could have changed the future...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe. But I'm still a cop.   And you're a murderer... As Calvin...punches in the last command... Victor is about to say something...when his mouth suddenly reduces itself to a perfect circle. Like a surprised smiley button. His face... Suddenly BLIPPING OUT. ...And Victor is gone. The KILLER ROBOT.   Collapsing to the floor in a thousand pieces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 156 Full power is suddenly restored inside and out. LIGHTS coming on all at once. ALARMS SCREAMING throughout the complex. 157   INT. METAL HALLWAY - NIGHT                                   157 A furious ALFRED LANNING, marching down the hallway. Followed by a cadre of SECURITY GUARDS...They enter... 158   INT. MAINFRAME ROOM - CONTINUOUS                             158 ...The Mainframe Room. Stop short. It's empty. Except for the fallen panels. And the pile of ROBOT PARTS in the corner. 159   EXT. MAINTENANCE EXIT - U.S. ROBOTICS - NIGHT                159 Spooner, Calvin and Sonny emerging from an out-of-the-way MAINTENANCE EXIT. All looking the worse for wear. Spooner. Turns to Sonny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why'd you come back, Sonny? I thought you weren't programmed with the Three Laws.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's just say I wrote some of my own laws today, Detective: a robot must protect a friend from harm...as long as he's not a complete asshole. Spooner smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, that's certainly a start, Sonny. Sonny, suddenly breaking into a smile, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sonny.   You called me Sonny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't get used to it. Sonny, holds out his hand. Spooner. Looks at it. Then takes it. CLOSE ON their two METAL HANDS. Locked in a HANDSHAKE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective Spooner, I...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (anticipating) Let's just save the thanks, okay? Sonny nods.   Looks out at the city scape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what I'm going to do now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good -- That's one of the perks of freedom. Sonny looks at him. Grateful. Looks at Calvin. Then hesitates. Turns. And hurries off across the Plaza. Calvin and Spooner.   Watching them go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to have a hell of a time explaining this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry. I have a feeling that U.S. Robotics will be needing my services very badly in the future. She turns to Spooner and gives him a dazzling smile. Then suddenly PLANTS A KISS ON HIS LIPS. Spooner, completely surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am the only robo-psychologist around. She turns on her heel and heads back inside.    Spooner smiles. 160   INT. PLUSH CONFERENCE ROOM - U.S. ROBOTICS - NIGHT             160 Spooner sits down at that same long table with HOGENMILLER'S HOLOGRAM. It casually takes a sip of coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So.   You found out who killed me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I started to wonder about Victor the second I met him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is that, Detective?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too much access. Too much knowledge. Plus -- he smiled whenever your death was mentioned. Those models are programmed to frown at bad news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hah! Then even in this day and age, catching the killer all comes down to pure instinct! Spooner smiles. But his eyes are troubled.      He gets up. Walks over to the window. Stares out... EXT. CITY OUTSKIRTS - DESERTED ROADS - DAWN Sonny walking along deserted streets.   Looking over his shoulder. Keeping in the shadows.
direction.name: direction
